examples.description: Given the "capital_allowance_calculator_no_legacy_periods" feature is enabled -> And the current date is 2018-12-31 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2018-12-31 -> And the company has the following bank transactions: -> When the company has the following bank transactions: -> And the capital asset with description "small asset" has its tax treatment set to "Main Pool" -> And the asset with description "small asset" is disposed on 2018-12-31 for 5000 -> Then the capital asset with description "small asset" has the following history -> And for the corporation tax return ending on 2018-12-31 the capital allowance computations are -> And the corporation tax return ending on 2018-12-31 should have ledger entries

examples.description: Given the "capital_allowance_calculator_no_legacy_periods" feature is enabled -> And the current date is 2018-12-31 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2018-12-31 -> And the company has the following bank transactions: -> When the company has the following bank transactions: -> And the capital asset with description "small asset" has its tax treatment set to "Main Pool" -> And the asset with description "small asset" is disposed on 2018-12-31 for 5000 -> And the current date is 2019-12-31 -> And the asset with description "big asset" is disposed on 2019-06-01 for 8000 -> Then the capital asset with description "big asset" has the following history -> And for the corporation tax return ending on 2019-12-31 the capital allowance computations are -> And the corporation tax return ending on 2019-12-31 should have ledger entries
examples.full_description: Capital Allowances Company disposes of "big asset" and a year passes Given the "capital_allowance_calculator_no_legacy_periods" feature is enabled -> And the current date is 2018-12-31 -> And a UK Limited Company which was started on 2018-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2018-12-31 -> And the company has the following bank transactions: -> When the company has the following bank transactions: -> And the capital asset with description "small asset" has its tax treatment set to "Main Pool" -> And the asset with description "small asset" is disposed on 2018-12-31 for 5000 -> And the current date is 2019-12-31 -> And the asset with description "big asset" is disposed on 2019-06-01 for 8000 -> Then the capital asset with description "big asset" has the following history -> And for the corporation tax return ending on 2019-12-31 the capital allowance computations are -> And the corporation tax return ending on 2019-12-31 should have ledger entries
